review: 你说的对，但是《守望先锋》是由暴雪娱乐自主研发的一款多人网络射击游戏。游戏以未来地球为背景，讲述人类、守望先锋成员和智能机械的恩怨纠葛。游戏中有输出、重装、支援三种类型，总计32位风格迥异的英雄可以选择，还有29张地图可供战斗。玩家将控制许多风格迥异的英雄中的其中一个
我收到了召唤，我必须差评，一如既往

go back to your worst launcher in the world. why did you come to steam?? have online sales also fallen???? did you destroy the game yourself and hope that the steam community will help you? nothing else will help you. it was necessary to immediately release the game on steam when it was released.
只能说游戏虽好，暴雪该吃粑粑还是得吃
呵呵哒，不好说，但就是不喜欢了。

Devs : we wont continue pve but heres a few more gay heroes for you

also we put 2 on title so you need to pay money for that as well
垃圾暴雪 喜欢自己锁是吧 网易怎么你了 还蹬鼻子上脸 活该 玩家是真喜欢这游戏 你们自己把自己整的人不像人狗不像狗的
曾经有多爱，现在有多恨。

Solo es divertido con amigos. Monetización, grindeo del pase de batalla, recompensas y hasta el nuevo modo historia (fraccionada en distintas paginas web y contenido del juego anterior inaccesible) todo horrible.

我浪费了十分钟时间，33g磁盘空间，身体与精神伤害，就是为了写这篇差评
兄弟们，我做的对吗
给个差评舒服了。吃饭吃饭。76手感改的不错。但是不影响我差评。几百级的号，一堆活动皮金皮说没就没了。赶紧给爷噶。
原价买的游戏，前阵子变免费，我就不说啥了，起码还给点东西。上线之后给的那些东西我都有点要骂娘了。新英雄还没完多久呢。直接游戏都不给玩了？司马暴雪！趁早黄。
Пиздатая игра, но пве не куплю =*
看什么快点刷差评啊垃圾暴雪

They care more about money than the game.
Gimme back my 6v6 shooter!
游戏黑屏直接进不去 傻逼暴雪

我的六年青春是OW1
OW2是什么垃圾游戏？
暴雪是什么垃圾公司？
好si，滚
好玩，但是垃圾
как истинный фанат овервотча, я поставлю негативный отзыв
守望先锋是个好游戏，守望先锋2和鲍勃尻迪克不是好东西！
需要战网通行证登入游戏，真的很麻烦，还没有搞定的还是不要下载了。

5V5的模式让各个职位的压力变得很大，T基本一掉就意味着满盘皆输，相较之下C的作用变得意义不明，就算将C全部从游戏中剔除只留下T位好像也没有很奇怪。
个人认为更改为6V6模式增加一个T位可以有效解决这个问题。
整体游戏娱乐性不足，被强制按照要求选择英雄，也许可以满足竞技性但是难以满足作为游戏的娱乐性。
个人认为增加一个可以重复选相同英雄的模式可能会很有趣，甚至这个模式可以直接安排在快速模式中的一部分。
皮肤过于昂贵。
个人认为可以新增一些比如每升一级就可以获得的抽奖道具，让这个抽奖道具可以抽到皮肤以此来降低大部分皮肤的获取难度。

守望先锋2：毁我游戏期待，强力差评！

我简直无法忍受守望先锋2这款游戏的低劣品质！作为一个曾经痴迷于守望先锋的玩家，我对这款续作感到深度失望。游戏画面虽然稍有改进，但仍然逊色于其他同类游戏。角色设计简直毫无创意，没有一个令人难以忘怀的英雄形象。

平衡问题更是让我愤怒至极！某些英雄简直就是无敌存在，而另一些则被设计成脆弱无比。这种不公平让玩家感到无比的挫败，完全摧毁了游戏的乐趣。开发团队对于玩家的反馈似乎置若罔闻，完全没有采取措施来解决游戏的严重平衡问题。

守望先锋以其独特的团队合作和策略性玩法著称，然而守望先锋2却在这方面彻底失败。游戏模式毫无新意可言，地图设计更是索然无味，缺少战术深度和变化。

总的来说，守望先锋2是一款彻头彻尾的失败之作，彻底毁掉了我对于这个系列的所有期待。我感到愤怒、失望和无奈，希望开发团队能够为他们的低劣表现负起责任，重新审视游戏的问题，并采取强有力的措施来修复这个破烂游戏！

猫

从前，我养了一只猫，我有十块钱，会用八块钱给它买吃的，经常给它洗澡，它也很粘我。

后来，我带它出去玩，路人觉得它很可爱，他们给它喂猫粮，火腿肠，我很不开心，因为它是我的。我想把它抱回家，可是它挣脱我，冲着给它好吃的人喵喵，我抱了几次他都不跟我走，还挠伤了我，于是我转身就走了.....

后来，偶然在路上遇到了它，它身上脏兮兮的。路人们只会给它好吃的，陪它玩玩，却不会带它回家，给它洗澡。它看到我后就跟着我回家，我把它关在了门外，它在门外喵喵地叫着，叫的我很难受，
可是我不会再要它了
。

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.

如何在不下载游戏的情况下愉快的打差评
评测条件：通过挂时长软件添加游戏累计6分钟即可

PC端：
watt toolkit（原steam++）
ASF
SAM

移动端：
云挂卡APP
如何从库中移除游戏
主页 > 帐户 > 许可和产品序列号激活：点击移除即可
或者
客服 >> 我想从帐户中移除这款游戏

来点客观评价

先说公事：
停更几年，画了N年大饼的守望先锋2就是这玩意？改动还没个版本更新大，这些年员工都在忙什么？办公室性骚扰？看看当年守望2预告CG动画里老玩家的弹幕，现今看来只有2个字：心寒。逼肝骗氪就不说了，反正暴雪现在也就只会这个，我的战役模式呢？信誓旦旦的PVE一拖再拖，张口就是为了玩家更好的体验这些晦涩难懂的词。

再聊私事：
账号承载着老玩家的青春回忆，见证了和朋友一起欢笑犯糗的时光。你说没就没，这就是您说的为了玩家？向钱看嘛，不寒掺，哪怕您站直了脊梁骨，说几句真话，我对您的鄙夷也能少那么几分，来洗的暴白也会多一点。中国玩家不重要，但中国玩家的真金白银很重要。


新玩家的避坑理由
在这里，你能感受到如同上班一样的游玩快感
在这里，你会发现皮肤出的比版本更新更加勤快
在这里，你可以体会到原汁原味的正宗暴雪式傲慢
在这里，你能够看到无数新的承诺簇拥出的艰难决定
在这里，你将游玩一个拒绝中国市场和中国玩家的高贵洋产，玩之前，先低头再折腰。

结语：
再不刷差评，我可要给三国杀打好评了哦

I have been playing overwatch since the closed beta back in 2016, and it was my main game for a good while.
With basically every newly released hero, the state of the game deteriorated, causing me to drop the game back in 2018 during the height of the GOATs meta.
The announcement of a PvE game with the overwatch characters felt like a breath of fresh air, causing me to pick the game back up in late 2019.
Despite the annoyances I had with the game, I found that there was still a core of fun, and that every once in a while I had a truly fun match.
I once again dropped the game after a while due to the sheer staleness of the game, due to the lack of content updates.
With the announcement of overwatch 2 PvP, me and my friends once again got interested in the game, and picked it up again.
To my (and my friends's) surprise, the game had become fun again! Not as fun as back during the early days, but the annoyances I had seemed to be mostly patched out!
With a couple of months of playing overwatch 1 again, we got into the closed beta for overwatch 2, and the change from 6v6 to 5v5 ended up being actually positive in our experience.
It freed up the game to be of a much higher pace, and much less shield focussed, although there were some balancing issues with the newest hero at the time, sojourn.
For every other hero that I had annoyances with, they were either reworked to be less annoying, or had been nerfed into obscurity.
Fast forward a couple of months and it's time for the actual release of overwatch 2, and the servers are just down for most of the first week, great start.
When I finally do get the chance to play, I realize that not only have they not adressed the issues I had with sojourn, but the time between the beta and actual release has made people realize just how abusable the character (and some of the reworked tanks) really are, and they are taking full advantage of it.
"Not a problem, it'll be patched out in a few weeks", I naively thought.
But they had once again falled into the same patterns that had initially caused me to dislike overwatch 1, releasing heroes with next to no regard as to how they would affect the gamestate as a whole and how annoying it might be to play with / against.
Both kiriko and lifeweaver fall into characters I have annoyances with, in different areas.
Kiriko is extremely annoying to fight due to her insane movement option, on demand invulnerability, slender hitbox and insane damage output. Whereas Lifeweaver straight up has a tool that can grief teammates harder than an enemy roadhog ever could.
Let alone the fact that they locked these new heroes behind a battlepass system rather than the old loot box system, which was already heavily criticized.
The final nail in the coffin was of course the cancellation of the PvE mode, that was an actual backstabbing of the community.
The entire point of the 2 in overwatch 2 was the fact that it would have this great, long and highly customizable PvE campaign mode, that would be extremely replayable and great for just messing around with friends.
Cancelling that completely invalidates the entire point of overwatch 2's existance, and I can't help but wonder what the fuck blizzard is thinking.
They have shot themselves in the foot, abandoning their own community for 3 full years only to release half baked content in an objectively worse format in a shameless attempt to milk the wallets of their playerbase even further than they already had.
I cannot with a good conscience reccomend overwatch 2. I truly wish there was a way to still play overwatch 1, because if I had the choice, that is what I would be playing.
